scripts.resetdb: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.resetdb:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.resetdb:ct: cross-env NODE_ENV=mariaDB npx sequelize db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=mariaDB npx sequelize db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=mariaDB npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.resetdb:rds: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
